Title: Amarnath yatra ends, least number of pilgrims in decade
Content: The 48-day annual pilgrimage to the Amarnath shrine in south Kashmir Himalayas ended on Thursday, coinciding with the festival of Raksha Bandhan, with over 2.20 lakh pilgrims offering prayers to the
